snippet: With the Teacher Retirement System of Texas buying a stake in Bridgewater Associates, DealBook dug deeper into the pension's novel investment in the world's largest hedge fund.
abstract: With the Teacher Retirement System of Texas buying a stake in Bridgewater Associates, DealBook dug deeper into the pension's novel investment in the world's largest hedge fund.

headline.main: Behind the Texas Pension's Deal With Bridgewater
